name: places/ChIJ5dc9mVf3wokRolTVgBF2NnY
formattedAddress: 810 W 187th St, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 810 W 187th St, New York, NY 10033-1218, USA

originalText.text:
Can't say enough about this GREAT place at its new uptown Heights location! Small and unassuming storefront belies its mighty service offerings -- I've been fortunate enough to experience both their general dry cleaning service last fall as well as their SUPERIOR stain-removing skills more recently; my grey patterned trench went in with a bunch of runny red stains embedded in the fabric from a wet, rainy Target bag and came out looking "good-as-new"!

Prices are reasonable; service is SUPERIOR -- Lisa is a sweet Gem of a store manager and provides super-friendly, quick Expert customer service, including follow up calls on items, as needed (she spotted two small holes in a neck scarf after I dropped it off with the trench, let me know about them and had 'em repaired so that the scarf was ready when the coat was). My new favorite Dry Cleaner should also be yours, too üíôüíé!

Fivestars ‚≠ê

Se habla Espa√±ol.

originalText.text: Amazing. Best cleaners and article care I've ever experienced. Removed nasty stains, I thought no way. Yes way. Saved slacks and also my fav jeans, repaired moth damage on my favorite cashmere, etc. (Pic of bad ink stain on my expensive jeans--they removed with no color damage at all). They are really passionate here about cleaning and repair. Thanks Lisa and staff!

text.text: Amazing. Best cleaners and article care I've ever experienced. Removed nasty stains, I thought no way. Yes way. Saved slacks and also my fav jeans, repaired moth damage on my favorite cashmere, etc. (Pic of bad ink stain on my expensive jeans--they removed with no color damage at all). They are really passionate here about cleaning and repair. Thanks Lisa and staff!

originalText.text: Called ahead and came in the middle of the work day to get my brand new suit hemmed. Even though it was not busy, I was treated with disrespect and disregard by disorganized front desk and chaotic tailor. They aggressively wasted my time and took advantage of my good nature and patience.  After so much of my day wasted, my garment crumpled and tossed in the corner and myself disregarded as a person, I decided to cut my losses and try a different shop the following day. When I asked for a refund of my $70, and to hand me back my suit they didn't even ask why. Not sure if it was because they know they messed up or they just don't care about the business. All I know is I'm not going back to find out.

originalText.text: They are the best tailor and dry cleaner around! Phenomenal service, attention to detail, and care! They turned a dress into a fabulous two piece set. The dress was originally kind of boring, but the way they cut and tailored it made me excited to wear this set on hot summer nights! It looks phenomenal. Another time, they created a proper waistline on a skirt I once cut myself. I‚Äôve taken sweaters filled with cat hair, and they come back looking brand new. I can not recommend this place more. They do everything with care and pay attention to detail. Lisa and the team are so kind- it is a joy to stop by!

originalText.text:
I have used the The Dry Cleaner for their organic organic dry cleaning and because of the opportunity to pick up items in reusable nylon bags.

They do everything with the utmost care, quality, and attention to detail. Lisa, the store manager, provides very personable customer services that goes the extra mile and makes you look forward to returning - thank you!

I couldn‚Äôt be more pleased with the superior dry cleaning, customer care and service. They are a great addition to the Hudson Heights neighborhood and I high recommend them!
